visualization_prompt: Generate a line chart showing monthly metric trends with visibility tracking using dynamic annotation updates

title.text: Monthly Performance Metrics with Visibility Tracking

visualization_explanation: The dataset represents a univariate time series with 12 monthly observations. Synthetic data follows a seasonal pattern with μ=104.2 and σ=17.8, featuring summer peak performance and Q4 decline. The line chart maximizes data-ink ratio by eliminating unnecessary gridlines while maintaining Cairo's perceptual discriminability through color contrast between the teal series and green annotations. The dynamic counter implementation uses Highcharts' annotation API to create persistent visibility tracking with cumulative updates, satisfying Tufte's principle of adjacent contextual information. Statistical anchors include synthetic data generation with realistic business metric ranges (80-140) and natural variance progression (±8% monthly fluctuation).
